column1: (1) NAV total return = NAV + reinvested dividends;
Source: Gresham House Asset Management Ltd.
These total returns are stated before the inclusion of VCT tax reliefs
which are designed to mitigate the higher risks and costs associated
with investing in smaller companies and the constraints of the VCT
legislation. The tax reliefs given at the time of subscription have varied
between 20% and 40% so any adjusted performance measure including
this relief will vary depending on the date of subscription. There is the
additional benefit of receiving VCT dividends tax free.
